org.apache.samoa.topology

Class AbstractStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.samoa.topology.AbstractStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stream
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlinkStream, S4Stream, SamzaStream, ThreadsStream

    public abstract class AbstractStream
extends Object
implements Stream
    Abstract Stream Helper for implementation of Stream. It has basic information for a Stream: streamID and source ProcessingItem. Subclass of this class needs to implement put(ContentEvent).
    Author:
    Anh Thu Vu
